item.title: Hit the North – In tribute to Mark E. Smith
item.author: Jack O'Brien,
item.description: To pretend that the clamorous and lengthy discography of The Fall, the fabled post punk band spearheaded by the imperious and now deceased Mark E. Smith, has shaped and defined my musical tastes would be a lie. I cannot claim that the fractious frontman served, as he has to so many others, as a …

item.title: Ode to an ambience, straight Frahm bald Nils
item.author: Jack O'Brien,
item.description: Nils Frahm stands out to fans of ambient music as an electronic producer and pianist ready to fill your brain with a tantalising fusion of classical composition and electronic reverb. He is an artist who since the mid-noughties, alongside his esteemed record label Erased Tapes, has brought forth …
